title: Partial Sum List
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `itertools.accumulate()` function in Python to create a list of partial sums from a given list of numbers.

meta.title: Partial Sum List: Mastering Python's Accumulate Function
meta.description: Explore the power of partial sums in Python using the itertools.accumulate() function.
meta.keywords: partial sum, accumulate, itertools, python, programming
